SELECT o_number, o_date, o_status, o_count FROM Orders WHERE u_id = #{u_id};
SELECT o.o_number o_number, o.o_count o_count, o.o_date o_date, o.o_status o_status, b.b_title b_title FROM Orders o LEFT JOIN Book b ON o.b_code = b.b_code WHERE u_id = #{u_id};
SELECT b.b_title b_title, b.b_price b_price, b.b_img b_img, b.b_genre b_genre, b.b_like b_like FROM BookLike L LEFT JOIN Book b ON L.b_code = b.b_code WHERE L.u_id = #{u_id};
SELECT r.r_content r_content, r.r_star r_star, r.r_id r_id, b.b_title b_title FROM Review r LEFT JOIN Book b ON r.b_code = b.b_code WHERE u_id = #{u_id};
SELECT O.b_code , b.b_title FROM OrderDetail O LEFT OUTER JOIN Review r ON r.b_code = O.b_code LEFT JOIN Book b ON O.b_code = b.b_code WHERE O.u_id = #{u_id} AND r.u_id IS NULL;
SELECT q_title, q_content, q_date FROM Quest WHERE u_id = #{u_id};
